name: Goose on Fire!
description:
"Goose on Fire" is a pixel 2D casual top-down shooter about setting ducks on fire(🥺) The player should collect eggs from ducks and survive for as long as possible! Be careful, sometimes ducks are angry! The game was created in 7 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. The theme was “LET THERE BE CHAOS“ Controls:
  • Movement: WASD
  • Shooting: LMB
